document.full_text: the world health organization (who) said the misuse and irrational use of antibiotics has undermined the global fight against tuberculosis and malaria, warning of a possible return to the days before the drugs were developed.
document.title: who warns drugs misuse weakens fight against diseases
lines_and_colors: the world health organization (who) said the misuse and irrational use of antibiotics has undermined the global fight against tuberculosis and malaria, warning of a possible return to the days before the drugs were developed.
